sentences.sContent: The nurse dressed the wound expertly.
sentences.sCn: 护士熟练地敷药包扎了伤口。

sentences.sContent: The nurse disrobed the elderly patient expertly.
sentences.sContent_eng: The nurse disrobed the elderly patient expertly.
sentences.sCn: 护士熟练地脱去了较老病人的衣服。

sentences.sContent: If you’re a perfectionist, like me, you might especially be prone to not doing anything at all if you think you can’t do it expertly.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you’re a perfectionist, like me, you might especially be prone to not doing anything at all if you think you can’t do it expertly.
sentences.sCn: 如果你是个像我一样的完美主义者，你认为你不能熟练地完成它，你就很可能什么都不做。
